messages.subject: Funny Family
messages.msgSnippet: My sister said the same thing to me only she wouldn t let me take her kids because she didn t want them homeschooled.  Instead she is leaving them to her
messages.messageBody:
My sister said the same thing to me only she wouldn't
let me take her kids because she didn't want them
homeschooled. Instead she is leaving them to her
husband's cousin in Oregon who the kids don't know and
doesn't have nay children. I have four and live near
them and they know me. Go figure. I told her isn't
it more important that they are loved. Although I
have to say if she took my children, I would not want
them to go to school, but at least I know they would
be with people that loved them.

Leslie
